dcterms:creator: Mai-Vu Tran
Hoang-Quynh Le

Quoc-An Nguyen
dcterms:description: The dataset includes Vietnamese news items on various topics, divided into training, validation, and test datasets, with clusters of 3-5 documents per topic and reference abstractive summaries provided for training and validation.
dcterms:title: Vietnamese dataset published in VLSP Evaluation Campaign 2022

dcterms:creator: Mai-Vu Tran
Hoang-Quynh Le
Duy-Cat Can
Quoc-An Nguyen
dcterms:description: The dataset is used for the Vietnamese Abstractive multi-document summarization task, providing a framework for developing summarizing systems that generate abstractive summaries from clusters of documents.
dcterms:title: AbMuSu VLSP 2022 dataset
